title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
text: Expansive open-world RPG where players take on the role of the Dragonborn, with the freedom to explore a richly detailed world, battle dragons, and embark on countless quests.

title: Valheim (early access)
text: Cooperative survival game set in a Viking-inspired world, where players must gather resources, build structures, and face off against formidable creatures in order to progress and ultimately conquer the realm.

title: Dead By Daylight
text: Asymmetric multiplayer horror game where players can take on the role of either a savage killer or one of four survivors trying to escape.

title: Stardew Valley
text: Farming simulation game where players inherit and manage their own farm, while also engaging in various activities such as fishing, mining, and building relationships with the townsfolk.

title: Need For Speed: Most Wanted
text: Racing game that combines thrilling street racing with intense police pursuits. Players aim to climb the ranks of the 'Blacklist' by defeating rival drivers and evading law enforcement, all while customizing their cars and exploring the city.

title: The Legend of : Majora's Mask
text: Action-adventure game set in the mystical world of Hyrule. The game follows Link's quest to save the land from destruction by a falling moon, with a unique time-traveling mechanic that requires players to relive the same three days repeatedly.

title: Dragon Quest IX: Sentinels of the Starry Skies
text: Role-playing game where players create and customize their own hero and embark on a grand adventure to protect the world from a threat. With turn-based combat, offers a vast world to explore.

title: God of War
text: Action-adventure game set in Norse mythology, players control Kratos, the former Greek god of war, who embarks on a journey with his son Atreus.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
text: Action role-playing game set in a post-apocalyptic world where humanity has regressed to a tribal society, and robotic creatures roam the land. Players take on the role of Aloy, a skilled hunter, as she embarks on a quest to uncover the truth about her origins and the mysteries of the world.

title: Mutazione
text: Narrative-driven adventure game set in a mutant-infested community. Players assume the role of Kai, a young girl who visits her ailing grandfather and becomes involved in the lives of the eccentric residents.

title: Batman (Ocean Software)
text: Side-scrolling action game where players control Batman as he battles Gotham City's villains. With platforming elements and atmospheric visuals, it offers an early gaming experience of being the iconic Dark Knight.

title: Resident Evil 4 VR
text: Players step into the shoes of Leon S. Kennedy as he navigates a sinister village and confronts grotesque creatures infected by a parasitic organism.

title: Guitar Hero: Warriors Of Rock
text: Rhythm-based music game where players use a guitar-shaped controller to simulate playing rock music. It delivers an immersive experience for all the metalheads and fans of the franchise.

title: Rhythm Paradise
text: Rhythm-based music game where players engage in a series of mini-games with catchy tunes and unique challenges.

title: Spiritfarer
text: Cozy management game where you are Stella, that takes on the role of the 'Spiritfarer', guiding spirits to their final journey in the afterlife.

title: Professor Layton and the Curious Village
text: Puzzle-solving adventure game where players control Professor Hershel Layton and his apprentice, Luke Triton, as they investigate the mysterious village of St. Mystere.

title: Portal
text: With its mind-bending puzzles, dark humor, and a memorable antagonist in the form of GLaDOS, Portal offers a unique and immersive experience that challenges players' critical thinking and spatial awareness.

title: Super Mario Galaxy
text: With its innovative gravity-based gameplay mechanics, imaginative level design, and a charming soundtrack, Super Mario Galaxy offers a captivating and whimsical journey through galaxies filled with platforming challenges and memorable characters.
